title: deop
description: Revokes operator status from a player.

fields.title: player
fields.description: Required. Specifies which player to remove operator from. A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player.

overloads.title: Deop
overloads.description: Revoke operator status from a player.
